body.p: Born April 17, 1798 in Pittsfield, Berkshire County, Massachusetts. Fought in the War of 1812. Graduated from Fairfield New York Medical College in 1819. Was a Surgeon in the Army for a short period after graduation. Moved to Natchez, Mississippi in 1823. Moved to Memphis, Tennessee in 1850. In 1851, Became the Co-Editor of the “Memphis Medical Recorder.” In 1864, moved to New York, New York where he died November 3, 1873.
